name: bang.html
description: BANG! Web Component custom elements with async templating, smooth syntax and custom void  tags!

scripts.lint: clear && npx eslint src/bang.js || : && npx eslint src/vv/vanillaview.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && watch -n 5 ./scripts/cpfiles.sh & npx serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.test: npm run clean && watch -n 5 ./scripts/build.sh & npx serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.7guis: npm run clean && watch -n 5 ./scripts/build.sh & npx serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.7guis-dev: npm run clean && watch -n 5 ./scripts/cpfiles.sh & npx serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.prod: npm run clean && watch -n 10 npm run build& npx serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.clean: rm -rf .types || : && rm -rf .build-temp || : && rm -rf dist/ || : && rm -rf docs/vv || : && rm docs/*.js || : && rm docs/7guis/*.js || :
scripts.prepublishOnly: killall npx watch serve || : &&npm run build
scripts.build: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&./scripts/build.sh && cp .build-temp/bang.js dist/pack.bang.js && rm -rf .build-temp || : ./scripts/cpfiles.sh
scripts.compress: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&killall watch npx serve || : &&./scripts/build.sh && npx roadroller -t text -a eval .build-temp/bang.js -o dist/pack.bang.js && rm -rf .build-temp || : && ./scripts/cpfiles.sh

author: @dosy
